= Service Projects =

== Chassis/`*` Atom Service ==

This project manages an implementation of the Atom Publishing Protocol, initially based on eXist, with extensions for querying data within and across collections.

|| Project Type || Eclipse Dynamic Web Project ||
|| JDK Compliance Level || 1.5 ||
|| Target Runtimes || Apache Tomcat v6.0 ||
|| Dynamic Web Module Version || 2.5 ||
|| Default Context Root || `chassis-generic-service-atom` ||
|| SVN Location || [http://code.google.com/p/dsn-chassis/source/browse/trunk/generic/service/atom/ /trunk/generic/service/atom/] ||

Standards:

  * All HTML files as XHTML 1.0 transitional, UTF-8 encoding

== Chassis/`*` User Service ==

This project manages default implementations of the user service, providing remote access to an authenticated user's details and roles.

|| Project Type || Eclipse Dynamic Web Project ||
|| JDK Compliance Level || 1.5 ||
|| Target Runtimes || Apache Tomcat v6.0 ||
|| Dynamic Web Module Version || 2.5 ||
|| Default Context Root || `chassis-generic-service-user` ||
|| SVN Location || [http://code.google.com/p/dsn-chassis/source/browse/trunk/generic/service/user/ /trunk/generic/service/user/] ||

Standards:

  * All HTML files as XHTML 1.0 transitional, UTF-8 encoding

== Chassis/`*` File Upload Service ==

This project manages an implementation of a service handling file upload posts from HTML forms.

|| Project Type || Eclipse Dynamic Web Project ||

= Developer Deployment Projects =

These projects provide the ability to run a GWT client and all supporting services within a single web application, in GWT hosted mode -- hence "monolith".

N.B. these projects *should not contain any code*, only configuration.

== Chassis/`*` Developer Monolith ==

An all-in-one project for the generic Chassis/`*` GWT client and services.

|| Project Type || Google Web Application Project ||
|| JDK Compliance Level || 1.5 ||
|| SVN Location || [http://code.google.com/p/dsn-chassis/source/browse/trunk/generic/dev/monolith/ /trunk/generic/dev/monolith/] ||

Project dependencies:

  * Chassis/`*` GWT Libraries
  * Chassis/`*` GWT Client
  * Chassis/`*` Atom Service
  * Chassis/`*` User Service
  * Chassis/`*` File Upload Service

== Chassis/WWARN Developer Monolith ==

An all-in-one project for the Chassis/WWARN GWT client and services.

|| Project Type || Google Web Application Project ||
|| JDK Compliance Level || 1.5 ||
|| SVN Location || [http://code.google.com/p/dsn-chassis/source/browse/trunk/wwarn/dev/monolith/ /trunk/wwarn/dev/monolith/] ||

Project dependencies:

  * Chassis/`*` GWT Libraries
  * Chassis/`*` GWT Client
  * Chassis/WWARN GWT Libraries
  * Chassis/WWARN GWT Client
  * Chassis/`*` Atom Service
